metadata.Title: CVE-2019-1010024 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - low.
metadata.Description: ** DISPUTED ** GNU Libc current is affected by: Mitigation bypass. The impact is: Attacker may bypass ASLR using cache of thread stack and heap. The component is: glibc. NOTE: Upstream comments indicate "this is being treated as a non-security bug and no real threat."

notes.Note: mdeslaur> upstream does not consider this to be a security issue. marking as ignored.

criterions.comment: glibc: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
